content.description: there is a10ftwide by an 8ft tall boulder,  you can work on at the top of the falls. there is a lot more climbing right next to the fall but the ground isn't flat so placing a crash pad is hard, and since it's near the water there is a lot of bugs and the holds get wet a lot of the time. the wall can get to 40ft ish, but I don't think top roping is allowed in the south mountain reservation, so that's annoying. I would say there is 50ft of climbable space if you can get your pad to lay flat, and don't mind it getting a little wet.
